comment:
USA wants #hydroxychloriquine urgently from India 

India Govt in return asked 

‚û°Ô∏èUnrestricted Access to USA market for its Pharma companies
‚û°Ô∏èLift all bans levied by US FDA 
‚û°Ô∏èFDA will not harass Indian Pharma companies henceforth

USA accepted all demands in 24 hours
